thread.title: Packy's untimely death should shine light on plight of elephants in zoos (Opinion)
thread.title_full: Packy's untimely death should shine light on plight of elephants in zoos (Opinion)

author: Guest Columnist
title: Packy's untimely death should shine light on plight of elephants in zoos (Opinion)
text: By Courtney Scott In a recent opinion piece, ("What Packy Taught Us," Feb. 14), Oregon Zoo Director Don Moore leaves out the most important lesson that Packy provided to the world. Namely, that elephants do not belong in captivity. They...
